title: Far Cry 5 Gold Edition [UNLOCKED]
description:
Title: Far Cry 5
Genre: Action, Adventure
Developer: Ubisoft Montreal ,Red Storm ,Ubisoft Shanghai ,Ubisoft Toronto ,Ubisoft Kiev 
Release Date: 27 Mar, 2018

Far Cry comes to America in the latest installment of the award-winning franchise.Welcome to Hope County, a once-peaceful fictional region in rural Montana. Hope County has been taken over by a fanatical doomsday Cult, the Project at Eden’s Gate. It’s up to you to save the besieged community as the deadly Cult is wreaking havoc in the region, using force to convert its residents! Take on the role of Hope County sheriff's deputy and organize a resistance movement solo or in two-player co-op. In Far Cry 5, customize your character, take control of cars and planes to engage in epic battles against the cult leader Joseph Seed and his Heralds. Face a world that hits back & spark the fires of resistance with your Guns and Fangs for Hire! 

Far Cry comes to America in the latest installment of the award-winning franchise.Welcome to Hope County, a once-peaceful fictional region in rural Montana. Hope County has been taken over by a fanatical doomsday Cult, the Project at Eden’s Gate. It’s up to you to save the besieged community as the deadly Cult is wreaking havoc in the region, using force to convert its residents! Take on the role of Hope County sheriff's deputy and organize a resistance movement solo or in two-player co-op. In Far Cry 5, customize your character, take control of cars and planes to engage in epic battles against the cult leader Joseph Seed and his Heralds. Face a world that hits back & spark the fires of resistance with your Guns and Fangs for Hire! 

The Gold Edition includes the game, the Digital Deluxe Pack & the Season Pass.

Digital Deluxe Pack inludes : 

- The Big Game Hunter Pack
- The Ace Pilot Pack
- The Explosive Pack
- The Chaos Pack
- AR-C Assault Rifle & .44 Magnum Handgun with unique skins

Season Pass includes : 

- 3 Post-launch Stories
- Additional weapon

How to install :

Mount/burn the iso
Install
WAIT FOR CRACK ! WAIT FOR CRACK ! WAIT FOR CRACK !
Play
